name: Courier (snorv)
description:
Courier is a short game about delivering mail.

Happy April!

I learned how to make shaders. This game has palette swapping. Isn't that neat?

CONTROLS

[Z / ENTER / Gamepad Button South] - Confirm

[X / SHIFT / Gamepad Button East] - Cancel

[Z / ENTER / Gamepad Button West] - Interact

[X / SHIFT / Gamepad Button South] - Jump

[C / ESCAPE / Gamepad Button Start] - Menu

[Arrow Keys / Stick] - Move

[F4] - Fullscreen
